This product comes with exceptional features and benefits that I believe could significantly enhance your experience. Considering its quality and the value it brings, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at $140. I hope this price aligns with your expectations and allows you to make the most out of this opportunity. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer
